tagline: Little command-line tool to export Skype chat history to another format. Implemented format is Trillian XML log format, but other formats may easily be supported by adding implementations of the OutputHandler interface.
body:
#Export Skype

Little command-line tool to export Skype chat history to another format. Implemented format is Trillian XML log format, but other formats may easily be supported by adding implementations of the OutputHandler interface.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Export-skype
